group_1.textLeft: And now, what everyone has been waiting for,@the Magical Girl corner!

group_1.textRight: Before I knew it, it had quickly become a regular@part of our show...

group_1.textLeft: Ever since we first started discussing the topic,@there's been lots of complications.
Especially since the information we share is@exclusive to our show, y'know.
We've witnessed a remarkable demand@from our viewers!

group_1.textRight: Even our program director has been enthusiastic@about including it on the schedule.
So, what information do we have today?

group_1.textLeft: Professor Satomi, who was on the show before,@has provided us with new insights!
Ta-da!

group_1.textRight: Um...
Concerning social media posts related to incidents@and accidents occurring in Yukuni City...?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, big data? I think that's what it's called.

group_1.textRight: Looks like the numbers went up at one point but@have recently declined.

group_1.textLeft: The timing on that rise matches up with when@Magical Girls were turning into Witches.
Ah, when the Eradication Faction was cornering@Magical Girls, I mean.

group_1.textRight: So, the decrease might be linked to a decline in@the Eradication Faction's activity?
Oh, after Professor Satomi's appearance,@the upward trend slowed down.
And recently, it's been rapidly decreasing.

group_1.textLeft: Now, Magical Girls are working hard to regain@people's trust.
Despite the hardships, they're battling former@allies-turned-Witches to protect Yukuni City.
Their results are clearly visible through the@restoration of public safety!

group_1.textRight: Ugh... There's just too many Familiars!
If we don't defeat them, it'll be difficult to approach@the deep chamber where the Witch is...!

group_1.textLeft: We need to rely on Sasha's unique magic to@weaken them.

group_1.textRight: There are too many!
Rabi, what are you doing...?

group_1.textLeft: With my concept reinforcement power,@I've strengthened your unique magic.
This should be enough to deal with a large@number of opponents.
Asahi will divert the Familiars' attention and@create space for Sasha.

group_1.textRight: Yes, ma'am. I can see the way forward now!
...Come along now, Familiars.
This is the enemy you should be aiming for!
They're coming! Now!

group_1.textLeft: Now I can concentrate on playing!
[surround:7026_harp][flashEffect:flashWhiteSlow2]Please fall asleep with the sounds I play!

group_1.textCenter: Finally, I'll carve a path through to the deepest area@with this boomerang...!

group_1.textLeft: Are you...alright...?

group_1.textRight: Ugh... Somehow...!
Hey, your leg...!

group_1.textLeft: It got taken out by that blow earlier...

group_1.textRight: Why don't we retreat for now?
Even if you fight in this condition, there's no@chance of winning...

group_1.textLeft: One leg is enough, let's prioritize defeating it@here and now...

group_1.textRight: Are you serious about this...?

group_1.textLeft: If we let the Witch escape here, and ordinary@people get hurt,
it'll give them another chance to take advantage@of our weaknesses...

group_1.textRight: Okay, I gotcha...
Once we're back in the deepest section, use this@Grief Seed to purify.
Let's review our unique magics and devise a@strategy before facing the challenge again.

group_1.textLeft: Okay!

group_1.textRight: That's right... It can't escape now...!
